body: I love this site I love to come here just watch the snowflakes shout and scream and cry there hearts out but I still hate them
Y'all retarded

Here is a comment from someone named Foxriver12, a sick, depraved, violent person.  They describe in detail the grisly, horrific scenes they would like to act out for fun.  Here's their idea of a good time:  "If it were up to me, I would tie you up on all fours in public and have you raped by a pig full of disease to make you even dirtier than you already are and then I would throw you into a pen of hungry hyenas, who would devour you alive without bothering to strangle you and of course, I would invite people to take a seat in a gallery just so they could laugh at the scares of the degenerates that you are... That's a fitting fate for those who have the indignity to masturbate over rape, excuse it or put it into perspective."
Disgusting, sickening, depraved person without even the decency to realize that there are people who might not be able to handle their sick, perverted descriptions.

Once again the Nhentai comments are flooded with idiots who cant discern the difference between fantasy and reality. I bet they kiss their body pillow of whatever anime character/vtuber they simp for goodnight. If you want to go around calling people out maybe try not to out yourself first as a die hard fanatic of the source material yeah?

Besides, even Subaru is slandered here, have you seen her react to Julius out of jealousy? Do you really think he would let someone he loves be raped and that he would start sleeping with his rapist, like a happy cuckold with gay impulses like the majority of them? No, he would go back in time and stab her in the back. Plus someone in a coma, especially someone in Rem's situation, wouldn't react at all to a sexual act.

There are so many mangy dogs in the comments, it disgusts me. Poor unethical trash perverted to the core by lust and who don't even deserve to meet women as respectable as Emilia or Rem, to draw this kind of slanderous filth. You just deserve to stay isolated from the rest of the world on an island, in eternal solitude. Where is your pride, aren't you ashamed, you animals? Do you like humiliation? If it were up to me, I would tie you up on all fours in public and have you raped by a pig full of disease to make you even dirtier than you already are and then I would throw you into a pen of hungry hyenas, who would devour you alive without bothering to strangle you and of course, I would invite people to take a seat in a gallery just so they could laugh at the scares of the degenerates that you are...
